I'm a PhD student and research associate at the working group <a target="_blank" href="https://www.mediapsychology.ifp.uni-mainz.de">Media Effects and Media Psychology</a>, Department of Communication, Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz.

**My research interests include:**

- entertainment media use and effects
- algorithmic curation of media content
- digital autonomy & mental health
- computational communication science
